CustomField.formula: IF ( ISBLANK(MPM4_BASE__Actual_Finish_Date__c), MPM4_BASE__Due_Date__c - IF(ISBLANK( MPM4_BASE__Actual_Start_Date__c), MPM4_BASE__Start_Date__c, MPM4_BASE__Actual_Start_Date__c ) + 1, MPM4_BASE__Actual_Finish_Date__c - IF(ISBLANK( MPM4_BASE__Actual_Start_Date__c), MPM4_BASE__Start_Date__c, MPM4_BASE__Actual_Start_Date__c )+1)
CustomField.label: Duration
